mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.userId,a.sysTaskId, a.allCount, a.finishedCount, a.awardType, a.type,a.award, a.status,a.createTime, a.lastUpdate,a.skipUrl,a.ruleId,a.dateType,a.startTime,a.endTime,b.name,b.remark,b.imageUrl,b.rule FROM uc_user_task_todo a join uc_sys_task b on a.sysTaskId=b.id WHERE a.userId = #{userId} and a.dateType = 'D' and a.createTime >= (SELECT CURDATE()) and a.createTime <(SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -1 DAY)) UNION ALL SELECT a.id,a.userId,a.sysTaskId, a.allCount, a.finishedCount, a.awardType, a.type,a.award, a.status,a.createTime, a.lastUpdate,a.skipUrl,a.ruleId,a.dateType,a.startTime,a.endTime,b.name,b.remark,b.imageUrl,b.rule FROM uc_user_task_todo a join uc_sys_task b on a.sysTaskId=b.id WHERE a.userId = #{userId} and a.dateType = 'M' and a.createTime >= (SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -DAY(CURDATE())+1 DAY)) and a.createTime <(SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE() - DAY(CURDATE()) + 1, INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) UNION ALL SELECT a.id,a.userId,a.sysTaskId, a.allCount, a.finishedCount, a.awardType, a.type,a.award, a.status,a.createTime, a.lastUpdate,a.skipUrl,a.ruleId,a.dateType,a.startTime,a.endTime,b.name,b.remark,b.imageUrl,b.rule FROM uc_user_task_todo a join uc_sys_task b on a.sysTaskId=b.id WHERE a.userId = #{userId} and a.dateType = 'Y' and a.createTime >= (SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL DAYOFYEAR(NOW())-1 DAY)) and a.createTime <(SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(NOW())+1,'-01-01'))

SELECT a.id,a.userId,a.sysTaskId, a.allCount, a.finishedCount, a.awardType, a.type,a.award, a.status,a.createTime, a.lastUpdate,a.skipUrl,a.ruleId,a.dateType,a.startTime,a.endTime,b.name,b.remark,b.imageUrl,b.rule FROM uc_user_task_todo a join uc_sys_task b on a.sysTaskId=b.id WHERE a.userId = #{userId} and a.dateType = 'O'

SELECT a.id,a.userId,a.sysTaskId, a.allCount, a.finishedCount, a.awardType, a.type,a.award, a.status,a.createTime, a.lastUpdate,a.skipUrl,a.ruleId,a.dateType,a.startTime,a.endTime,b.name,b.remark,b.imageUrl,b.rule FROM uc_user_task_todo a join uc_sys_task b on a.sysTaskId=b.id WHERE a.userId = #{userId} and a.type = '3'
